com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

Interface LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator

  • Enclosing class:
    LoggerFactory

    public static interface LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator
    The interface that should be implemented through the SmartConfigurator class (with no package name, because of Android restriction), in order to indicate to the framework which Logger implementation should be used.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> theClass)
      The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(Class) every time a logger needs to be created.
      Logger getLogger(java.lang.String category)
      The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(String) every time a logger needs to be created.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        Logger getLogger(java.lang.String category)
        The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(String) every time a logger needs to be created.
        Parameters:
        category - the logger category, which is a common concept to the Log, java.util.logging.Logging, Log4J libraries
        Returns:
        the Logger that should be used for logging on that category; is not allowed to be null
        See Also:
        getLogger(Class)

      • getLogger

        Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> theClass)
        The method will be invoked by the LoggerFactory.getInstance(Class) every time a logger needs to be created.
        Parameters:
        category - the logger category, which is a common concept to the Log, java.util.logging.Logging, Log4J libraries
        Returns:
        the Logger that should be used for logging on that category; is not allowed to be null
        See Also:
        getLogger(String)
